TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Can upgrade units outside of national borders

French.Text: [ICON_BULLET]Peut améliorer les unités en dehors des frontières nationales

TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]E' possibile aggiornare le unità al di fuori dei confini nazionali.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]Puede actualizar unidades fuera de las fronteras nacionales.
TEXT.Finnish: [ICON_BULLET]Can upgrade units outside of national borders

TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]%D1 de bonificación a la Estabilidad Revolucionaria Nacional

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]%D1 to RevIdx bonus from State [ICON_RELIGION] Holy City

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]%D1 reduction to RevIdx penalty from Non State [ICON_RELIGION] Holy City
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]%D1 de réduction de la pénalité 'RevIdx' des Villes Saintes de la religion [ICON_RELIGION] (non d'état)
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]%D1 Reduktion des RevIdx-Malus durch die Heilige Stadt der nicht-Staats-[ICON_RELIGION]

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can only be Built on %s1_Name and Earlier Starts
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Peut uniquement être constuit par %s1_Name et aux débuts précédents
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Kann nur gebaut werden bei %s1_Name und früheren Spielestarts
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Può essere construito/a solo nella %s1_Name o precedenti
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Solo puede ser construido en %s1_Name y Épocas anteriores
TEXT.Finnish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can only be Built on %s1_Name and Earlier Starts
